website_summaries.verdict: An adorable yet useful addition to any pool party.
pros: Durable floating coasters easily keep your drink afloat and upright in the pool
Ideal size for holding cans or red solo cups
Fun, adorable design your guests will love
Cup holder space can be used to hold additional party favors
cons: Cup holders work best when your can or cup is half full

customer_reviews.title: these worked great as decorations in and around a pool
customer_reviews.text: SO fun. used simply as is floats in pool and also smaller pool; not as drink holders so I don't know about that. we do have little battery candles to place in them for nighttime enjoyment. inflating them is easy w 2 people - one person holding and another using a little pump (not included)- and they stayed inflated for a good couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Ciel H.

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for party favors! I filled them up with Hershey kisses but also demonstrated what their purpose was in front ina bowl of water. The flamingo floated in water for 4 hours with a full can of soda, without problem before we took it out. EVERYONE was very impressed and kept commenting on how cute they were. I even had people wanting extras! (Good thing I purchased a lot) this was perfect, absolutely zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ish

customer_reviews.title: Whomp whomp
customer_reviews.text: Unable to inflate all the way due to the tiny valve allowing all the air out when you try to close it. When you do close the plastic valve, what air that is left in it will only allow half a 16oz water bottle to stay afloat. Not the beta buy... but hey! I got some cute flamingo stares out of it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: These are so fun to have as part of summer party favor "bucket" ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun to have as part of summer party favor "bucket" I put together! Good size and the seller is great. I purchased 4x16 and some of them were leaking air. I contacted the seller and received replacement for the defective ones. A++ on customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Susan C

customer_reviews.title: these things look adorable floating around in my pool
customer_reviews.text: these things look adorable floating around in my pool. am just obsessed with Flamingos so they are a nice add on.. haven't used yet to actually put a drink into one to hold.. But was very disappointed as the very first one I went to inflate had a hole in the seam, even with a patch on it, can't get it to inflate.. and another one seems to have a slow leak.. So glad I opted for the 16 piece and not the 3 piece set..
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Lauzier

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and a big hit at the party
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to our Golden Girls party! All blew up and held air. They fit the plastic cups from party city. Everyone thought they were so much fun. They will float with a drink in the cup but if it gets too top heavy it can flip.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Loved by all ages
customer_reviews.text: We had a b-day party at the beach and these cuties were enjoyed by all. Well made and really do float even with a full drink inserted
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo cute
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn’t need these?!?! Super cute and have multiple uses! Seriously in love ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Tera-Rose

customer_reviews.title: These were really cute and everyone loved them, they just didn't stay blown up bc ...
customer_reviews.text: These were really cute and everyone loved them, they just didn't stay blown up bc of the valve, it let air out as soon as you go to close it. I used them as party favors by putting cups filled with chips and candy and the kids loved them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Brought a lot of fun to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Brought a lot of fun to the pool. Good value too, get a lot of flamingos for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E

customer_reviews.title: Worked out in
customer_reviews.text: One had a hole, but they were perfect for a party we had
customer_reviews.author: Sarah @blessedcrazytxnest

customer_reviews.title: fun for the lake
customer_reviews.text: Most held up well, we've only used them a couple of times, but are inexpensive and did float in the lake.
customer_reviews.author: JillHannah

customer_reviews.title: Didn't really work in water
customer_reviews.text: Great idea...didn't really work but still loved them for birthday thank you gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Cinaid Borgard

customer_reviews.title: cute party favor
customer_reviews.text: good price for the bunch. One wouldn't hold air, but the rest were fine.
customer_reviews.author: ScienceMommy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So cute. I used them as center piece decorations. Have not tried to see how they float.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gifts for a professional development activity! Easy to blow up and sturdy to last!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a party!
customer_reviews.text: So fun - I bought these as gifts for the attendees at a bachelorette party. They were so fun to have in the pool and around the house! Awesome that this pack comes with so many.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Heath

customer_reviews.title: These were a huge hit and worked great. We had stemless champagne flutes and 12 oz
customer_reviews.text: These were a huge hit and worked great. We had stemless champagne flutes and 12 oz. beers in them. I would however suggest deflating them when not using so they can last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kid parties!
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little bigger. Very cute. We are using for drink holder at party the as party fave to take home along with a pineapple or coconut cup.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for party favors for a 13 year old girls birthday. Everyone loved them. Not sure if they float
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to a pool party! We had one lame flamingo, but it didn't ruin the party
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Wilhite

customer_reviews.title: Super cute though and was fun for a bachelorette party
customer_reviews.text: They held our solo cups but weren't strong enough to hold a beer can or bottle. Super cute though and was fun for a bachelorette party.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Don’t waste your money. Yes it was cheap but totally unusable. The inflatable flamingos could not be inflated and the straws were so flimsy they broke before we could use them
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: Total
customer_reviews.text: Total garbage. They don’t hold air at all! Very disappointed in these. They’re useless. They are not worth the money. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon White

customer_reviews.title: Fun novelty for a pool partyL
customer_reviews.text: Fun novelty for a pool partyL!. One had a hole in it but the rest worked. Slightly difficult to blow up with your mouth and put the plug in before air goes out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: They were cute but four (25%!!!) of the flamingos had a hole and would not hold air. We had 16 for dinner. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Better value than in the big chain stores. Thin but will hold a drink or you can create your own flamingo water army.
customer_reviews.author: EspyOF

customer_reviews.title: floating flamingo coaster
customer_reviews.text: Overall they are worth the price. I had 2 that had holes and 2 that the heads were on backwards. I only needed 10 so it worked out. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: mawbabs

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad.
customer_reviews.text: Cute. One of the sixteen wouldn't hold air. Not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: SteveB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: super adorable for pool party, out of 16, only got 2 defected.
customer_reviews.author: MeiMei

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a prank. They'd never hold a cup very well but, damn, they're cute.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S Andress

customer_reviews.title: Don't actually hold cups
customer_reviews.text: Cans tip over in the pool in these floats. We had to use them as more of a cute pool decoration for our pool party.
customer_reviews.author: Josh K Roberts

customer_reviews.title: If these were ment to be only coasters then they were perfect. The kids loved playing with them
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but did not hold the beverages upright in the pool. If these were ment to be only coasters then they were perfect. The kids loved playing with them. Would buy again for a multiaged party but probably not for only adults.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!!! Worked great for the lake! They don't hold beers bottles tho! Cans are great.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Richards

customer_reviews.title: ... ordered 48 pcs for a pool party and had great fun with those flamingos
customer_reviews.text: we ordered 48 pcs for a pool party and had great fun with those flamingos, 3-4 of them lost some air, the other ones stayed fine, would order again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I picked up these for the summertime - they work! So cute!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kenney

customer_reviews.title: They are difficult to blow up.  Maybe not so much for a young person.
customer_reviews.text: Coasters were as expected. Fast delivery. Used them as party favors. Great value. I was very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ghertler

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: We used these for my daughters Alice Through the Looking glass themed birthday party. So fun!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle N.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but 2 had leaks right out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ancker

customer_reviews.title: These floats did the job and were perfect for my party
customer_reviews.text: These floats did the job and were perfect for my party. A few of them would tip over in the pool of the drink was too full.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the amount but don't blow up perfeftly
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Latch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! Second purchase to take on vacation. Holds drinks and is great to share with new friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Elizabeth Stamper

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very fun for the pool or lake. downfall is they don't hold a full can, very tipsy!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the package up to use as party favors and it's missing two coasters!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They fall over when you put a drink or bottle in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: All inflated easily but one had a hole in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best! We were the most popular people in the ...
customer_reviews.text: The best! We were the most popular people in the pool! So fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bachelorette party goodie bags
customer_reviews.text: I used these in goodie bags I made. The quality is ok I only saw a couple people using them by the pool. They seemed float fine in the water. I would definitely recommend using a hand pump they're pretty cheap and will blow these up to full capacity which totally makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Ass 101

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone wanted to take one home from the party.....Win Win!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

product_meta.title: 16 PCS Inflatable Flamingo Coasters Cup Drink Holders with 20 Pcs Flamingo Drinking Straws for Lula Party Supplies/Hawaiian/Birthday/Pool Party Decorations
feature_bullets: PERFECT FOR POOL PARTIES: The pink inflatable flamingo pool coasters and pink flamingo straws are perfect for all kinds of pool parties,such as Hawaiian Luau party ,bachelorette party.and beach themed party . They add color and more fun to both children and adult parties.Several would give you a flock of happy pool guests !

STRONG AND THICK: our inflatable coasters are made of thick, durable and strong material.The flamingo straws are made of food safty plastic,safe to use and environmentally friendly.They hold drinks upright in water and make sure you have fun floating around in the pool with your drink also enjoying some floating time.
REUSABLE: due to its durability and thickness, our waterproof inflatable flamingo drink holder can be reused many times.
INFLATABLE AND LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN: with the coasters being inflatable, you can easily carry the coasters with you anywhere you go,because they are easy to inflate and fold.
100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: We offer a 30-day full refund if you do not find our inflatable flamingo coasters useful. Your satisfaction is guaranteed with us.
